text: Is there a reason most weather apps don't show confidence intervals?

elements.text: Is there a reason most weather apps don't show confidence intervals?

text: Mainly because the goal is communication, and practice has shown that showing ranges of possibilities leads to confusion and misunderstanding. Partially because there's no solid methodology for computing such a confidence interval

elements.text: Mainly because the goal is communication, and practice has shown that showing ranges of possibilities leads to confusion and misunderstanding. Partially because there's no solid methodology for computing such a confidence interval
